276.punchline: I love minorities. My wife is actually an intelligent woman.

277.punchline: If you ever get into a knife fight with a girl bring some bread and mayo. They can’t resist making sandwiches.

278.punchline: My ex-wife used to love chocolate. I think that’s one of the reasons why she ran off with a Jamaican man.

279.punchline: The following conversation took place between a husband and wife.

281.punchline: The following conversation took place at a church wedding:

282.punchline: My wife shouted at me today for forgetting to take the lamb out the freezer. Sadly it couldn’t withstand the freezing temperatures and died after a couple of hours.

283.punchline: My daughters just got to the age where she’s starting to ask awkward questions about sex.

284.punchline: My wife recently starting taking cooking lessons and last night she surprised me by making spaghetti puttanesca with freshly baked garlic bread. After we finished the meal she said “Now be brutally honest, what did you think?”. I said “That meal was incredible, you fat c*nt”.
